# Beginner: Improve CTA button contrast

Description
--
Adjust the primary CTA button color or text color in `src/app/globals.css` to improve color contrast (small change to `.btn-primary`). Use a slightly darker background or bolder text.

Acceptance criteria
--
- Update `.btn-primary` in `src/app/globals.css` to use a color with better contrast (e.g., `#0b57d0` or make text `font-weight:700`).
- Visual check confirms improved readability.

Notes
--
- This is a single-line CSS change and helpful for accessibility.
